3233563402024329602.Text: The fryse hags are mages dedicated to the teachings of Kyne, the widow of the god Shor. Each is a powerful sorceress skilled in the use of frost-based magicka. They're vicious lasses, and view most people as a threat to their beliefs. They've been seen out in the wild, and in a couple of the ice caves.

154255821006816837.Text: The fryse hags are powerful and savage mages dedicated to the teachings of Kyne, the Mother of Men. They despise anyone not of their order, and will attack on sight.
